definitions.definition: a brown metal made of copper and tin:
examples: The church bells are made of bronze.

definitions.definition: a dark orange-brown colour, like the metal bronze
a statue (= a large artistic object) made of bronze
a small, round piece of bronze given to a person who finishes third in a competition:
examples: He got a bronze in the high jump.

definitions.definition: being dark orange-brown in colour, like the metal bronze
